mapper.insert: insert into room (room_number, room_type_id, status, floor, price, capacity, description, is_deleted, created_at, updated_at) values (#{roomNumber}, #{roomType}, #{status}, #{floor}, #{price}, #{capacity}, #{description}, 0, now(), now())
mapper.select: select name from room_type where id = #{roomTypeId} and is_deleted = 0
select id from room where room_number = #{roomNumber} and is_deleted = 0
select * from room where id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0
